mapper.select: SELECT V2CRR.INVEST_TYPE as invest_type, V2CRR.DURATION as duration, V2CRR.RATING as rating, V2CRR.AMOUNT_LAST as amount_last, V2CRR.AMOUNT_CURRENT as amount FROM wp_v200_credit_risk_rating V2CRR WHERE 1 = 1 AND V2CRR.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND V2CRR.PERIOD = #{period}
SELECT V2CRN.INVEST_TYPE as invest_type, V2CRN.DURATION as duration, V2CRN.NOTE as note FROM WP_V200_CREDIT_RISK_NOTE V2CRN WHERE 1 = 1 AND V2CRN.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND V2CRN.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT V300.TYPE as type, V300.INT_RISK_PERIOD as intRiskPeriod, IF(V300.AMOUNT = 0, null, V300.AMOUNT) as amount, IF(V300.AMOUNT_LAST_CNY = 0, null, V300.AMOUNT_LAST_CNY) as amountLast, V300.SORT as sort FROM wp_v300 V300 WHERE 1 = 1 AND V300.STATUS = 'Y' AND V300.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND V300.PERIOD = #{period}
SELECT DISTINCT V300.INT_RISK_PERIOD as intRiskPeriod FROM wp_v300 V300 WHERE 1 = 1 AND V300.STATUS = 'Y' AND V300.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND V300.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY V300.SORT

select ifnull(ifnull(a.pbc,a.rep),'应交税费') as TaxPayableItem from (select (select trim(dbs.LIAB_ITEM) from ds_balance_sheet_init dbs,ds_import_file dif where dif.IMPORT_FILE_ID = dbs.IMPORT_FILE_ID AND dbs.LIAB_ITEM like '应%税费%' AND dif.NAME_SEG_2 = #{fundId} AND dif.NAME_SEG_4= CONCAT(SUBSTR(#{period}, 1, 4) - 1,'1231') limit 1) as rep, (select trim(dbs.LIAB_ITEM) from ds_balance_sheet dbs,ds_import_file dif where dif.IMPORT_FILE_ID = dbs.IMPORT_FILE_ID AND dbs.LIAB_ITEM like '应%税费%' AND dif.NAME_SEG_2 = #{fundId} AND dif.NAME_SEG_4= #{period} limit 1) as pbc) a
SELECT IFNULL(sfi.INT_SEN_METHOD,'久期法') as intSenMethod, IFNULL(sfi.PRI_SEN_METHOD,'Beta法') as priSenMethod FROM sys_fund_info sfi WHERE 1 = 1 AND sfi.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND sfi.ACTIVE = 'Y' LIMIT 1

SELECT CONCAT( sh.HYPOTHESIS_NUM, '. ', sh.DESCRIPTION ) AS description FROM sys_hypothesis sh WHERE 1 = 1 AND sh.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND sh.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND sh.HYPOTHESIS_TPYE = '利率' ORDER BY sh.HYPOTHESIS_NUM

SELECT sh.HYPOTHESIS_NUM as hypothesisNum, sh.DESCRIPTION AS description FROM sys_hypothesis sh WHERE 1 = 1 AND sh.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND sh.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND sh.HYPOTHESIS_TPYE = '利率' ORDER BY sh.HYPOTHESIS_NUM

SELECT V400L.TRX_CODE as trxCode, V400L.SHORT_NAME as shortName, V400L.MKT_VALUE as mktValue, V400L.CAL_RESULT as calResult FROM wp_v400_line V400L WHERE 1 = 1 AND V400L.`STATUS` = 'Y' AND V400L.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND V400L.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT V400T.SORT as sort, V400T.VAR_DESC as varDesc, IF(V400T.INFL_LAST = 0, null, V400T.INFL_LAST) as inflLast, IF(V400T.TOTAL_MKT_VALUE = 0, null, V400T.TOTAL_MKT_VALUE) as totalMktValue, IF(V400T.SEN_ASSET_EXCL = 0, null, V400T.SEN_ASSET_EXCL) as senAssetExcl, IF(V400T.VAR_FLEX = 0, null, V400T.VAR_FLEX) as varFlex, IF(V400T.INFL_CURRENT_CLIENT = 0, null, V400T.INFL_CURRENT_CLIENT) as inflCurrentClient FROM wp_v400_test V400T WHERE 1 = 1 AND V400T.STATUS = 'Y' AND V400T.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND V400T.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY V400T.SORT LIMIT 0,2

SELECT V500IV.ITEM as item, V500IV.MKT_VALUE as mktValue, V500IV.PRI_SEN_ASSET as priSenAsset FROM wp_v500_invest_view V500IV WHERE 1 = 1 AND V500IV.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND V500IV.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY V500IV.SORT

SELECT V500REV.ITEM as item, IF(V500REV.AMOUNT_CURRENT = 0, null, V500REV.AMOUNT_CURRENT) as amountCurrent, IF(V500REV.AMOUNT_LAST = 0, null, V500REV.AMOUNT_LAST) as amountLast, IF(V500REV.NET_VALUE_CURRENT = 0, null, V500REV.NET_VALUE_CURRENT) as netValueCurrent, IF(V500REV.RATIO_LAST = 0, null, V500REV.RATIO_LAST) as ratioLast, IF(V500REV.RATIO_CURRENT = 0, null, V500REV.RATIO_CURRENT) as ratioCurrent FROM wp_v500_risk_exposure_view V500REV WHERE 1 = 1 AND V500REV.STATUS = 'Y' AND V500REV.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND V500REV.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT IF(SUM(V500REV.NET_VALUE_CURRENT) = 0, null, SUM(V500REV.NET_VALUE_CURRENT)) as netValue, IF(SUM(V500REV.AMOUNT_CURRENT) = 0, null, SUM(V500REV.AMOUNT_CURRENT)) as amountCurrent, IF(SUM(V500REV.AMOUNT_LAST) = 0, null, SUM(V500REV.AMOUNT_LAST)) as amountLast, IF(SUM(V500REV.AMOUNT_LAST) = 0, null, SUM(V500REV.AMOUNT_LAST))/NET_VALUE_LAST as ratioLast, IF(SUM(V500REV.AMOUNT_CURRENT) = 0, null, SUM(V500REV.AMOUNT_CURRENT))/NET_VALUE_CURRENT as ratioCurrent FROM wp_v500_risk_exposure_view V500REV where 1 = 1 and V500REV.STATUS = 'Y' and V500REV.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and V500REV.PERIOD = #{period} and if(FIRM_CODE = 'JS',V500REV.SORT != '30','1= 1') LIMIT 1

SELECT CONCAT( sh.HYPOTHESIS_NUM, '. ', sh.DESCRIPTION ) AS description FROM sys_hypothesis sh WHERE 1 = 1 AND sh.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND sh.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND sh.HYPOTHESIS_TPYE = '其他价格' ORDER BY sh.HYPOTHESIS_NUM

SELECT sh.HYPOTHESIS_NUM as hypothesisNum, sh.DESCRIPTION AS description FROM sys_hypothesis sh WHERE 1 = 1 AND sh.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND sh.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND sh.HYPOTHESIS_TPYE = '其他价格' ORDER BY sh.HYPOTHESIS_NUM

SELECT V500T.SORT as sort, V500T.VAR_DESC as varDesc, IF(V500T.INFL_LAST = 0, null, V500T.INFL_LAST) as inflLast, IF(V500T.VAR_FLEX = 0, null, V500T.VAR_FLEX) as varFlex, IF(V500T.INFL_CURRENT_CLIENT = 0, null, V500T.INFL_CURRENT_CLIENT) as inflCurrentClient FROM wp_v500_test V500T WHERE 1 = 1 AND V500T.STATUS = 'Y' AND V500T.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND V500T.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY V500T.SORT LIMIT 0,2

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(V500LS.TRX_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS trxDate, V500LS.UNIT_NET_VALUE AS unitNetValue, V500LS.DIVIDEND AS dividend, V500LS.CAL_RESULT AS calResult FROM wp_v500_line_slope V500LS WHERE 1 = 1 AND V500LS.`STATUS` = 'Y' AND V500LS.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND V500LS.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY V500LS.SEQ

SELECT V500L.TRX_CODE AS trxCode, V500L.SHORT_NAME AS shortName, V500L.MKT_VALUE AS mktValue, V500L.CAL_RESULT AS calResult FROM wp_v500_line V500L WHERE 1 = 1 AND V500L.`STATUS` = 'Y' AND V500L.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND V500L.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT seq as seq, item as item, AMOUNT_HK as amount_hk, AMOUNT_OTHER as amount_other, AMOUNT_SUM as amount_sum FROM wp_v600_risk_exposure where 1 = 1 and FUND_ID = #{fundId} and PERIOD = #{period} order by seq;

SELECT SORT as seq, INFL_FACTOR as infl_factor, BASE_AMOUNT as base_amount, BASE_AMOUNT_LAST as base_amount_last, INFL_WORDS as infl_words, INFL_AMOUNT as infl_amount, INFL_AMOUNT_LAST as infl_amount_last FROM wp_v600_test where 1 = 1 and FUND_ID = #{fundId} and PERIOD = #{period} order by seq;

SELECT sh.HYPOTHESIS_NUM as hypothesisNum, sh.DESCRIPTION AS description FROM sys_hypothesis sh WHERE 1 = 1 AND sh.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND sh.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND sh.HYPOTHESIS_TPYE = '外汇' ORDER BY sh.HYPOTHESIS_NUM

SELECT SUM(ev.MKT_VALUE_ENTERED) *0.05 FROM ey_valuation ev WHERE 1 = 1 AND ev.fund_id = #{fundId} AND ev.period = #{period} AND ev.ATTR5 = '港股通' AND ev.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM = '1102' AND ev.ENTERABLE = 'Y' LIMIT 1

SELECT detail.mkv AS dMkv, total.mkv tMkv, IF(detail.mkv/total.mkv >= 0.3,'Y','N') flag, total.mkv*0.05 mkValue, detail.mkvLast AS dMkvLast, total.mkvLast tMkvLast, IF(detail.mkvLast/total.mkvLast >= 0.3,'Y','N') flagLast, total.mkvLast*0.05 mkValueLast FROM (SELECT SUM(IFNULL(MV.mkv,0)) mkv,SUM(IFNULL(MV.mkvLast,0)) mkvLast FROM (select sum(IFNULL(MKT_VALUE,0)) mkv,sum(IFNULL(MKT_VALUE_LAST,0)) mkvLast from wp_h10000_tfa where fund_id = #{fundId} and period = #{period} and ITEM = '股票' UNION ALL select SUM(IFNULL(ev.MKT_VALUE_ENTERED,0)) mkv,0 from ey_valuation ev left join ey_fund_info efi on ev.ATTR3 = efi.FUND_CODE AND ev.PERIOD = efi.PERIOD WHERE ev.fund_id = #{fundId} AND ev.period = #{period} AND ev.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM = '1105' AND ev.ENTERABLE = 'Y' AND efi.SFC_TYPE IN ('股票型基金','混合型基金','REITs') UNION ALL select 0,SUM(IFNULL(ev.MKT_VALUE_ENTERED,0)) mkv from ey_valuation ev left join ey_fund_info efi on ev.ATTR3 = efi.FUND_CODE AND ev.PERIOD = efi.PERIOD WHERE ev.fund_id = #{fundId} AND ev.period = concat(left(#{period},4),'1231') AND ev.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM = '1105' AND ev.ENTERABLE = 'Y' AND efi.SFC_TYPE IN ('股票型基金','混合型基金','REITs') ) MV) detail, (select sum(IFNULL(MKT_VALUE,0)) mkv,sum(IFNULL(MKT_VALUE_LAST,0)) mkvLast from wp_h10000_tfa where fund_id = #{fundId} and period = #{period}) total LIMIT 1
